comments: In 1882 established a business (L. Boehmer & Company) in Yokohama, Japan, exporting plants, especially cycads and bonsai,  to J.C.Schmidt at the Erfurt nursery in Germany. Boehmer retired in 1895 and sold the business to Albert Unger.  The business existed until 1908.
source: Obit. in Gard Chron., ser. 3, 20: 498 (1896).  See also, obit. for Alfred Unger in Gard. Chron., 105: 31 (1839).
